channel.title: Creative on research notes
channel.description: Recent content in Creative on research notes

item.title: Go North
item.description:
Man digs hole.
Finds precious object.
Takes it home.
Wipes it clean.

Genie appears.

Genie says, “I will grant you one wish.”
Man says, “I expected three.”
Genie says, “Only one - and you will have to work for it.”
Man says, “Then I want to live forever.”

Compass appears in man’s hand.
Folded paper in the other.

item.title: Driving through Baltimore
item.description:
a bridge collapsed in Baltimore today
the guy on the radio is blaming the president
was he driving the boat?
I think it was that guy’s fault
the guy driving the boat
why did all the victims have names from other places?

across the world they’re making people fight
i don’t really know what orthodox means
you mean they didn’t have to before?

the previous president is selling bibles
to pay for his bail
because he paid a prostitute
and said he was a billionaire
but a millionaire for tax purposes
then became president for a while
and now he wants to be again
